title: The servers are so stupid
body: I played two games in a row with ping issues and everything is working well the games before that were fine but than all of a sudden my ping start to spike out of no where and no it isn't my router or anything this happenes for no reason in random games and I end up afk for half my game and probably get reported I don't want to get banned off a game when I spent money on it when the games over servers act up and screw me over

replies.body: Lag spikes or inconsistent input delays could be due to a connection issue with your network.  Please run our [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)which can help find out what went wrong as well as provide a list of steps to resolve this.  I hope that helps, but please let me know if you continue to experience issues with this.

Your speaking to a wall my friend Riot will NEVER admit to server problems on their end and if you get put into low queue for it then your stuck they can't help. I think Riot sees League as a cash cow and thats it.
Rest assured Riot is committed to delivering the best player experience.
